Package index

Core Classes

Main simulation framework classes

Design
R6 Class representing a simulation design
Simulation
R6 Class representing a simulation environment
SynthPop
R6 Class representing a synthetic population

Model Components

Disease and exposure modeling classes

Disease
R6 Class representing an disease
Exposure
R6 Class representing an exposure

Package overview and utilities

IMPACTncdJapan: A package with functions for the IMPACTncdJapan model.
